Package KI304.Kudyk.Lab3

Class Monitor

java.lang.Object
KI304.Kudyk.Lab3.Monitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
TouchScreen
public abstract class Monitor extends Object
Abstract class Monitor models a generic computer monitor. Serves as a base for more specialized displays such as TouchScreen.
